metadata.description: Candice Crow is the lead singer in an all girls rock band. But that is the only thing that is good in her life. Her father beats her and her sister. Her mother died long ago. She has no money or any income. Her best friend and band member, Claire has recently died. And Candice recently started getting rashes and lesions when she's exposed to air for too long. She needs a change, she needs a break - and it cannot come too soon!
metadata.name: Candice Crow
